blogPost.excerpt: Business Banking APIs empower any aggregator, platform, neobank, or marketplace to easily perform banking functions on top of their existing corporate accounts or enable the same for their customers in India.
blogPost.body: Business Banking APIs empower any aggregator, platform, neobank, or marketplace to easily perform banking functions on top of their existing corporate accounts or enable the same for their customers in India.
blogPost.title: Business Banking APIs by Decentro - Perform banking functions on top of corporate accounts
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 商业银行API使任何聚合商、平台、新银行或市场能够在其现有的企业账户之上轻松地执行银行功能，或为其印度客户实现同样的功能。
localize.tagline: 履行公司账户之上的银行职能

localize.description: 商業銀行API使任何聚合商、平臺、新銀行或市場能夠在其現有的企業賬戶之上輕鬆地執行銀行功能，或爲其印度客戶實現同樣的功能。
localize.tagline: 履行公司賬戶之上的銀行職能

previous.excerpt: DogeHouse is an open-source audio chat on the web. No more begging for invitations. Works across all platforms. Powered by Doge 🐶
previous.title: DogeHouse - Open-source audio chat on the web.

localize.description: DogeHouse是一个开源的网络音频聊天。不再需要乞求邀请。适用于所有平台。Powered by Doge🐶
localize.tagline: 网络上开源的音频聊天。

localize.description: DogeHouse是一個開源的網絡音頻聊天。不再需要乞求邀請。適用於所有平臺。Powered by Doge🐶
localize.tagline: 網絡上開源的音頻聊天。

next.excerpt: People around the world recorded the sounds of their forests, so you can escape into nature, while in lockdown or unable to travel. Use this site to chill, meditate or do some digital shinrin-yoku.
next.title: Tree.fm 🌲 - Tune into forests from around the world

localize.description: 世界各地的人们记录了他们的森林之声，所以你可以在被封锁或无法旅行的情况下，逃进大自然。在这个网站上，你可以放松心情，冥想或做一些数字神林屋。
localize.tagline: 聆听来自世界各地的森林之声

localize.description: 世界各地的人們記錄了他們的森林之聲，所以你可以在被封鎖或無法旅行的情況下，逃進大自然。在這個網站上，你可以放鬆心情，冥想或做一些數字神林屋。
localize.tagline: 聆聽來自世界各地的森林之聲
